title: MacBook Pro 13 2016 A1708
message:
Is that part of the horrible design on these screen !!
no cracks or physical damage , screen goes totally black 
if bend more then 90 degrees.
seen this on so many of these models !!

title: MacBook Pro 13 2016 A1708
message: Definitely a screen issue. It’s stupid

title: MacBook Pro 13 2016 A1708
message:
Seems that now Apple try, like many other brands, to get machines which rapidly fail after warranty gone.
But some of them fail before.
They probably calculated high price covers such cases...
